text: Sakuya, thanks for the minutes from the other day!

I don't mind.
I'd be happy if I could help you and Yuika──

You're really helpful.
Yuika was grateful too.

On that day, Kogane gave a lot of opinions
──Oh, right.

Although it's not directly related to the meeting's agenda,
the warehouse seemed a bit dusty, didn't it?

Hehe, we did a bit of cleaning ourselves. It might be a
good idea to reconsider the cleaning frequency from now on.

Oh, no, I didn't mean to scold you.
I just thought it'd be good to discuss it...

Got it.
I'll think about it...!

──...About things like this... when I'm not around,
it's hard to keep track, isn't it?

If there's anything on your mind,
even small things... I'd like you to tell me.
I'll continue to report without hesitation from now on────
